description: Entelligence leverages artificial intelligence to provide insights, recommendations, and predictive analytics for businesses seeking data-driven decision-making capabilities

tools.name: ENTELLIGENCE_ADD_A_NEW_REPOSITORY
tools.description: Add a new repository to the system with specified details

IsPublic.title: Is Public
IsPublic.description: Whether the repository is public or private

UserUUID.title: User Uuid
UserUUID.description: Optional UUID of the user adding the repository

IngestPrs.title: Ingest Prs
IngestPrs.description: Optional flag to ingest pull requests

AccessToken.title: Access Token
AccessToken.description: Optional access token for private repositories

VectorDBURL.title: Vector Dburl
VectorDBURL.description: Optional URL of the vector database

IsMergedRepo.title: Is Merged Repo
IsMergedRepo.description: Optional flag indicating if this is a merged repository

DocumentationUrl.title: Documentation Url
DocumentationUrl.description: Optional URL for the repository"s documentation

OrganizationUUID.title: Organization Uuid
OrganizationUUID.description: Optional UUID of the organization the repository belongs to

tools.name: ENTELLIGENCE_INTERACT_WITH_THE_REPOSITORY_AGENT
tools.description: Send a question and related information to the Repository Agent and receive a streaming response

history.title: History
history.description: List of previous interactions or context

question.title: Question
question.description: The question to ask the Repository Agent

advancedAgent.title: Advanced Agent
advancedAgent.description: Optional flag to use advanced agent features
